name: tailwind-parcel-starter
description: Front-end starter kit using the Parcel bundler
author: Patrick Boivin

scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run dev:watch
scripts.dev:watch: NODE_ENV=development parcel watch -d public/dist src/scripts/*.js src/styles/*.scss
scripts.dev:build: NODE_ENV=development parcel build -d public/dist src/scripts/*.js src/styles/*.scss
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run prod:build
scripts.prod:build: NODE_ENV=production parcel build -d public/dist src/scripts/*.js src/styles/*.scss --no-source-maps
